command.name: MAOP
command.syntax: /msg chanserv MAOP <#channel> ADD <nick> /msg chanserv MAOP <#channel> DEL <nick | index#> /msg ChanServ MAOP <#channel> LIST
command.desc: This command is an alias to the ADDOP, DELOP, and LISTOP facilties except that it manipulates only ops at level 3 (MiniOp).

ex.pre: To grant Joe level 3 (AutoVoice) op status on #sorcery
